document.full_text: deutsche boerse ag  and nyse euronext  unveiled a special dividend on tuesday, flexing their financial muscle a month before shareholders decide whether to approve a merger that would create the world's largest exchange operator.
document.title: merger partners d.boerse, nyse dangle a dividend
lines_and_colors: deutsche boerse ag  and nyse euronext  unveiled a special dividend on tuesday, flexing their financial muscle a month before shareholders decide whether to approve a merger that would create the world's largest exchange operator.
